title: fix: gemini doesn't receive system messages...

body: change session to gpt method, add system messages as user messages to the gemini, and logging historical messages

logger.info(f"[Gemini] messages={gemini_messages}")

message信息打印，建议使用logger.debug打印，避免对话历史较长时候，打印过多日志~
